lowPerformanceMode.description: Enable low performance mode - shows only color picker squares and disables all text coloring. Use this for large files with many colors to bypass VS Code's 500 color decorator limit.

autoPerformanceMode.description: Automatically suggest low performance mode when files have many colors that may hit VS Code's decorator limit

enableColorPicker.description: Enable the VS Code colour picker for all supported colour formats

textStyle.description: GameText: Choose how text following GameText colours should be displayed

textEnabled.description: Inline Text: Enable highlighting for text following inline colour codes ({RRGGBB})

textStyle.description: Inline Text: Choose how text following inline colour codes should be displayed

textEnabled.description: Hex Parameters: Enable coloring for string literals following hex color parameters in function calls

textStyle.description: Hex Parameters: Choose how text following hex color parameters should be displayed

showAlphaWarnings.description: Alpha Warnings: Show warnings for colours with alpha value of 00
